description: Try our easy to follow Iced Green Tea With Mango recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Tea & iced tea,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Mango,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Iced Green Tea With Mango Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup lemon juice (and lemon slices, to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Trim 3 lemongrass stems, bruise, then roughly chop. Place in a small pan with 3/4 cup golden caster sugar, 40g finely sliced fresh ginger and 1 cup water over low heat. Stir until sugar dissolves. Increase heat slightly and simmer gently for 10 minutes. Place 4 green tea bags in a large heatproof jug, cover with 1 litre boiling water. Set aside for 2 minutes. Remove and discard teabags. Add lemongrass syrup to tea, stir to combine, then refrigerate for several hours or overnight. Strain, discarding lemongrass and ginger pieces. Add 500g pur√©ed mango flesh and 1/2 cup lemon juice to tea. Pour tea into glasses over ice cubes.
Garnish with lemon slices. Serve. Note: Tea can be made ahead of time, covered and refrigerated until required. Stir before serving.
